original_text: Then he saw seven other groups of grain that grew after the first seven groups. These grains were thin, because the hot east wind had burned them.
korean_text: 그 후에 또 가늘고 동풍에 마른 일곱 이삭이 나오더니

sentences.original_text: Then he saw seven other groups of grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 다른 일곱 무리의 곡식을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: that grew after the first seven groups
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 일곱 무리 다음에 자란 것들이었습니다

sentences.original_text: because the hot east wind had burned them
